entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
